name: Timelines
desc:
Timelines helps busy people find free time to spend with their loved ones. Input your schedule, add someone as a friend, and then merge your schedule with theirs to find shared free time.

        A good 70 % of this was pair - programmed with two other iOS Devs.We handled timezones by talking to the server in GMT and ISO,
    and only converted to local time upon presentation to the user.

name: Leet
desc: Let gives business travelers awareness of those with overlapping layovers so they can make networking connections. Collaborated with Ruby on Rails engineers with previous experience as a pilot and Delta contractor.

name: What Color Is It?
desc: Clock that converts the time of day into a color.
notes: Collaborated with Ruby on Rails engineers with previous experience as a pilot and Delta contractor.

name: Etsy Clone
desc: Clock that converts the time of day into a color.

name: Reccy
desc: A RESTful API for a social bookmarking service that lets users organize interesting links into recommendation lists.
notes: Collaborated with Ruby on Rails engineers with previous experience as a pilot and Delta contractor.
